function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited pre-event preparations for disease outbreaks","Impact":"Inability to respond and recover effectively from a global health threat","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive pre-event planning and preparedness measures","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, remote health monitoring, modeling the virus's spread","People":"Residents of cities, public health officials","Owner":"City governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of investment in smart city infrastructure","Impact":"Reduced ability to facilitate improved response abilities during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Increase investment in smart city infrastructures, repurpose existing infrastructure for pandemic response","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, wearable devices for remote health monitoring","People":"City residents, public health officials","Owner":"City governments, smart city development organizations"}]}
